info.titleen: I don't think we have enough time.
info.titleko: 난 우리에게 시간이 충분하다고 생각하지 않아.
info.descko: 수학여행 중 버스 출발 3시간 전에 친구와 할 수 있는 일은?
info.descen: How about baking a birthday cake for her?

sentense.en: We've got three hours before the tour bus leaves.
sentense.en_: We've got three hours before the tour bus leaves.

sentense.en: What do you want to do?
sentense.en_: What do you want to do?

sentense.en: How about getting something to eat?
sentense.en_: How about getting something to eat?

sentense.en: Bob! Is food all you ever think about?
sentense.en_: Bob! Is food all you ever think about?
sentense.ko: 밥, 기껏 생각하는 것이 경우 먹는 거냐?

sentense.en: Let's go back to that little bookstore.
sentense.en_: Let's go back to that little bookstore.

sentense.en: Absolutely not. You've already bought five books.
sentense.en_: Absolutely not. You've already bought five books.
sentense.ko: 그럴 수 없어. 넌 벌써 책 다섯 권이나 샀어.

sentense.en: How about taking a boat ride around the lake?
sentense.en_: How about taking a boat ride around the lake?

sentense.en: I don't think we have enough time.
sentense.en_: I don't think we have enough time.
sentense.ko: 난 우리에게 시간이 충분하다고 생각하지 않아.

sentense.en: Sure we do. The next boat leaves in thirty minutes.
sentense.en_: Sure we do. The next boat leaves in thirty minutes.
sentense.ko: 시간은 충분해. 다음 배가 30분 안에 떠나거든.

sentense.en: And the sign says the trip lasts an hour and a half.
sentense.en_: And the sign says the trip lasts an hour and a half.
sentense.ko: 그리고 표지판에 한번 타는데 한 시간 30분 걸린다고 쓰여있어.

sentense.en: We've got plenty of time then, so let's do it.
sentense.en_: We've got plenty of time then, so let's do it.
sentense.ko: 우리 시간은 충분하네. 그럼 그렇게 하자.
words: 풍부, 많음, 충분한, 충분히(in plenty 맣이), 많은

sentense.en: And maybe they sell hotdogs on the boat!
sentense.en_: And maybe they sell hotdogs on the boat!
sentense.ko: 그리고 아마 보트에서 핫도그를 팔 거야!
